entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
